basics.name: MOHD IZDIHAR ZUHDI ZULKEPLI
basics.label: INSTALLATION ANALYSIS ENGINEER
summary: Dedicated, industrious and delicate in work. He is an engineer with strong technical and organizational skills. Equipped with highly developed skills in implementation of effective solutions in engineering problems. He is adaptable, a quick learner, constantly being regarded as one of the best talent in the team and always comfortable to work in multinational environment.
Specialize in various installation analysis engineering activities including SURF, rigid pipelay and various subsea structures using advanced technique.

highlights: Provide specialist skills and knowledge in the areas related to engineering and analysis including design codes (DNVs, APIs and Internal Standards) related to Subsea engineering including installation engineering
Coordinate and engage in daily activities and schedule priorities for Subsea Engineering mainly using Orcaflex Software
Support Subsea projects and address various requirements for procurement, design and installation engineering/analysis
Assume responsibility for technical reports, design calculations, engineering analysis and interface with third parties including subcontractors and verification bodies
Required to attend and prepare for project progress meetings and departmental meetings
Training and mentoring of graduates and junior engineers
Liaise with operational engineer to support project engineering and be available for site visits and offshore trips when necessary
Liaising with drawing office to produce rigging arrangements, deck layouts. vessel approach corridor.
Rigging design and calculations for umbilical installation
Perform readiness review for every offshore installation operation scopes (Umbilical, spools, jumpers, flying leads installation and pre-commissioning)
Participate in mobilisation and demobilisation of intallation vessel
Produce lift and recovery plan for Jumper Installation

projects.name: Greater Enfield Development
details: Lead Engineer for flexible pipelines and jumpers installation analysis scope
Responsible engineer to review flexible installation procedure
Responsible engineer to manage and interface with TechnipFMC Oceania (Perth) for installation analysis work scope covering:
18 nos flexible flowlines and jumpers – 2”, 6”, 8” and 11” flexible pipes
2 nos flexible risers - 10” and 8” flexible risers
Various termination installation including Gooseneck, FLET, KOSCON, Unitech Connectors  and Midline connections
Various installation ancillaries including bend restrictor, bend stiffener, buoyancy and ballast modules, clump weights and subsea clamps
Lay over canyon crossing
Riser lazy wave configuration

projects.name: Block H Gas Development
details: Responsible engineer to perform in-place analysis work scope covering:
2 nos flexible risers (lazy wave configuration) – investigating Near, Far and Cross load cases
2 nos flexible flowlines

projects.name: Bardegg-2-Baronia
details: Responsible engineer to perform installation analysis work scope covering:
4 nos flexible flowlines – 8” and 10” flexible
Flexible product installation includes 1st end direct pull-in through J-tube, 2nd end pull-in through J-tube, Lay over subsea slippers, Lay over existing pipelines

projects.name: Kaombo
details: Responsible engineer to manage and interface with TechnipFMC France and India for installation analysis work scope covering:
6 nos 14” Rigid spools installation
Lifting and lowering to splash zone analysis
Advanced modelling method using Python

projects.name: Prelude FLNG
details: Lead Engineer for flexible flying leads installation analysis scope.
Responsible engineer to manage and interface with TechnipFMC Oceania for installation analysis work scope covering:
12 nos steel flying leads and 1 nos 3km electrical steel flying leads.
4 nos 12” flexible risers
1st end direct pull-in to Prelude FLNG, Lazy wave configuration and layaway
Various termination installation including Cobrahead, Blind lay and subsea pulling head
Various installation ancillaries including bend restrictor, bend stiffener, buoyancy and ballast modules, clump weights and dead man anchor

projects.name: Jangkrik Complex Field Development
details: Responsible engineer to perform installation analysis work scope covering:
7 nos flexible flowlines – 8”, 11.4” and 12” flexible pipes
7 nos infield umbilicals
Various termination installation including Junction box, Midline connections, PLR, Goosenecks and UTA
Lay on escarpment & free span rectification

projects.name: Kanowit PFLNG Satu Tie-In
details: Responsible engineer to perform installation analysis work scope covering:
1 nos flexible flowline – 10”
Various termination installation including Pulling Head and PLET.
PLET, 28” J-tube and Concrete mattress deployment through splash zone

projects.name: Panyu Offshore Gas Field Development
details: Responsible engineer to perform readiness review umbilical installation and flexible flowline precommisioning.
Responsible engineer for demobilisation of MCV Deep Orient.
Responsible engineer to produce 6nos rigid spools lift plan and riggings.
Responsible engineer to interface with vendor and procurement team for umbilical scope of installation.
Responsible engineer to produce deck layout for MCV Deep Orient, IK Merdeka and Su Ning 58 self propelled barge.

skills.title: ENGINEERING
description: Daily activities as Engineer requires proficiency in Orcaflex, AutoCAD, MathCAD and MS Office Suite
Past experience with softwares including Solidworks, ANSYS and Simul8,

skills.title: PROGRAMMING SKILLS
description: Passionate programmer with broad range of knowledge in programming

references.name: Alessandro Lodovelli
references.reference: He's very proactive in his work and proved himself as a problem solver. Besides, he also shown that he's a fast learner, prompt in his work, plan his work and try to find the easiest and most practical way to solve a problem.

references.name: Shahreyar Shahyarfar
references.reference: He is a self-motivated person, demonstrated a high level of performance in term of delivery of the works, prompt in his work and produce strong contribution to the team.

references.name: Gavin Ritchie
references.reference: He is capable, well organised, independent, proactive and a quick learner.
